item.title: CVE-2024-21663|2024-01-08T23:57:54.897Z -- DEMON1A -- Discord-Recon
item.description: Discord-Recon is a Discord bot created to automate bug bounty recon, automated scans and information gathering via a discord server. Discord-Recon is vulnerable to remote code execution. An attacker is able to execute shell commands in the server without having an admin role. This vulnerability has been fixed in version 0.0.8.
